ygData.subject: Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: What s wrong with having them kill a dragon? :) I think you d be selling yourself short with the Tamborine. Depending how near-uber they are, they may have
ygData.messageBody:
What's wrong with having them kill a dragon? :)

I think you'd be selling yourself short with the Tamborine.
Depending how "near-uber" they are, they may have all sorts of Dragon
loot laying around unused... I think even a Selo's Drum would be too
little in exchange for this.

It comes off King Tormax (I believe - you said you got it off an
Akanon Quest?) and EQPrices lists it for 25k (low, imo). I'd ask for
a Breath of Harmony or a Lute of the Howler.

Darkfox
Xegony

--- In eqbards@y..., Talies the Wanderer <snicker@p...> wrote:
> I have managed to acquire a near-epic item that I cannot use,
thanks to an incredibly random quest (details below). A friend of
mine with a near-uber-guild has offered to trade me "whatever I
want" for it, so I'm trying to come up with stuff that doesn't
require me to go to the Planes, or them to kill a dragon.
> Talies the Wanderer
>
> <details>
The Horn of Hsagra - 13 / 20 piercing, WAR, SHD, ROG, RNG, +35 AC +75
HP and some other assorted stats.
